page.title: 19COMMUNICATIONS - Lydham/More
page.content: {Postal Service}We have 3 letterboxes at Lydham, More and Linley. There is one delivery a day, and collections from letterboxes are twice a day, Mondays to Fridays, once on Saturdays. There is no postal service on Bank or National holidays. Collections and deliveries are made in vans.{Telecom- {munications}Very few homes are without telephones. There is one telephone box at Lydham.{Transport}Over 3/4 of homes have their own transport, those with- out, live in the villages. There are 2 major roads running through the area, several minor ones linking villages and outlying farms. There are 7 foot- paths. Roads are signposted, footpaths are not.{Bus Services}These run through the area from Bishop's Castle to Shrewsbury 7 times a day 6 times a week, twice on Sundays. To Welshpool once a week and Wentnor once a week.
